Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~muralisr ~greg.haskins What's your opinion on this? It seems chaintool|http://fabric-chaintool.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ would be a good fit?

Action.author: toddinpal
Action.body: Chaintool is in the right direction. However what I was suggesting was that the interface be discoverable, ideally because it was deployed with the chaincode.
